name: Neant
text: With things back to normal, you decide to get back on the path suggested by Earch

name: Neant
text: Alas ! The beast, herself, doesn't wish to get out of here just yet.

name: Neant
text: Satisfied you've made the right choice, you arm yourself with patience, and wait here.

name: Neant
text: For perhaps soon, she will desire to get out of here and let you get on with your journey.
